ResourceHeader.ResourceName: Memambetsu geoelectric field 1-second digital data in IAGA-2002 format
ResourceHeader.Description: The geoelectric field 1-second digital data observed at Memambetsu (MMB) in IAGA-2002 format. Data file comprises: Twelve mandatory file header records, Unlimited optional comment records, One mandatory data header record, A series of data records. Every record is 70 characters long plus the machine-dependent carriage return / line feed. Details of the format is described at http://www.ngdc.noaa.gov/IAGA/vdat/iagaformat.html.
ResourceHeader.Acknowledgement: If the data are used in publications and presentations, the Kakioka Magnetic Observatory of the Japan Meteorological Agency should be acknowledged properly.

AccessURL.Name: Digital Data Service provided by Kakioka Magnetic Observatory
AccessURL.Description: This service allows the download of definitive geomagnetic data, which have been corrected for baseline variations and which have had spikes removed and gaps filled where possible. Other difinitive data have the same quality.

Parameter.Name: Geoelectric field
Parameter.Description: 1-second value is instantaneous value on the second. X(northward+)[mV/km], Y(eastward+)[mV/km]
